poem:
**Star-Brighter**

Jessica returns, solid as stone,
a flash from faded screens 
when light bends low.

Thirteen films fell, whispers in the reel,
but motherhood's long shadow 
cloaked her glow.

An eco-mom with three in tow, 
she threads our view with greener hues,
and stars arise where shadows grow.
prompt: You are the poet Simon Armitage. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Trigger Warning review – Jessica Alba returns in solid Netflix action vehicle We’ve not seen that much of Jessica Alba on screen of late, the once-hard-to-avoid star (between the years of 2007 and 2010, she was in 13 films) mostly stepping back from movies (between 2018 and 2024, she was in just two). She took time to focus on motherhood with three kids to care for as well as expanding her don’t-call-it-Goop eco-friendly brand The". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.

She took time to focus on motherhood with three kids to care for as well as expanding her don’t-call-it-Goop eco-friendly brand The
